body: That's not how you make friends
It would be nice to see a sequel of the Fox's brother gangbanging the tengu

Ah yes, this was a masterpiece. From page one of this magnificent doujinshi, I could tell it was the Mona Lisa of it's time. From the first moment, Uya used his wind manipulation technique on Komaru, and made the crow feathers play with Komaru's body that it was going to get spicy, and spicy it proceeded to get. After Komaru's ejaculation in the first arc of this doujin, we immediately got right into the second arc, and I like that there was no downtime in between. When Komaru then pounced Uya and sniffed out something to eat from Uya's pockets and proceeded to eat a Dango, a secret tonic, and then got very lewd with Uya, and started 'playing with him' you could tell we were done playing around. Komaru then went to take the 85 year old Uya's virginity, making Uya's crow companions happy that Uya is finally graduating from being a virgin. Uya them proceeded to ejaculate in Komaru, and Komaru declared the friendship between the two that was halted until volume 2. This was emotional.
Yeah I should’ve read the tags before I read it, sadly it is yaoi
I thought this was yuri looking at the cover but unfortunately it was much worse, yaoi😨😨
